# resume(_:)

**Type Method**

Begins or continues an asynchronous image classifier training session.

## Declaration

```swift
static func resume(_ session: MLTrainingSession<MLImageClassifier>) throws -> MLJob<MLImageClassifier>
```

## Parameters

- **session**: An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLTrainingSession] instance that represents the training session.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLJob] that represents the image classifier training session.

## Training an image classifier asynchronously

- **makeTrainingSession(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Creates or restores a training session.
- **train(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Begins an asynchronous image classifier training session with a training dataset represented by a data source.
- **restoreTrainingSession(sessionParameters:)**: Creates an asynchronous training session for an image classifier by restoring an existing training session’s state from its parameters.
